activation.reactionTrigger: When a hostile creature that you can see moves out of your reach

data.description:
When an opponent opens themself up to a reflexive strike you can deliver a blow that shakes them to their core and forces them to hesitate.

When a hostile creature that you can see moves out of your reach, you can use your reaction to make a melee weapon attack and on a hit its Speed is reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.
